resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158579</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158579</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2654</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Law of refraction- Snells Law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gesetz des Brechung Snells Gesetzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La loi de la loi de Snells de réfraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A lei da lei de Snells do refraction-</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La legge di legge di Snells di rifrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο νόμος της διάθλασης - νόμος Snells</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La ley de la ley de Snells de la refracción</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates how an image is distorted when waves of light pass from one medium to another and undergo refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die zeigt, wie ein Bild wenn 
Wellen des hellen Durchlaufs von einem Medium zu anderen verzerrt wird
und machen Brechung durch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre comment une image est
tordue quand des vagues de passage léger d'un support à l'autre et 
subissent la réfraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre como uma imagem é 
distorcida quando ondas da passagem clara de um media a outro e 
submete-se ao refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra come un'immagine è 
storta quando onde del passaggio chiaro da un media ad un altro e 
subisce la rifrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει πώς μια εικόνα είναι 
διαστρεβλωμένη όταν κύματα του ελαφριού περάσματος από ένα 
μέσο σε άλλο και υποβάλλεται στη διάθλαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra cómo se tuerce una 
imagen cuando las ondas del paso ligero a partir de un media a otro y 
experimenta la refracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
